alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:50AM PST until December 08 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the Central Columbia Gorge. Accumulations in the Hood River Valley will be 4 to 8 inches, with the higher amounts towards the far upper valley near Parkdale. * WHERE...In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
